original_title: ดอกโสนบานเช้า
overview: The story of Pina and Nuansanow after they get married. They live together at suburban. Pina’s obsessed with his works and her feel neglected. She decides to become a model and meet Pajjai after that their relationships become chaotic.
title: Blooming Sesbania
